subject: Football
Running
Tests and Testing
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Thanks to the Redskins’ Albert Haynesworth and his act of defiance, the conditioning test, a series of timed sprints, is no longer, at least for now, an obscure task.
snippet: Thanks to the Redskins’ Albert Haynesworth and his act of defiance, the conditioning test, a series of timed sprints, is no longer, at least for now, an obscure task.
